Description: Part of tapestry, all cotton, design in undyed thread outlined in blue on a light blue (now green) ground. Design has repeating motif, an ankh sign standing in a crescent, cusped/beaded border, cusps facing inwards.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), MX-357-0 Unit X2-2 (below) North Temple Plaza
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
